TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IpcServerChannel extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiver, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ISecurableChannel
Public Class IpcServerChannel Implements IChannel, IChannelReceiver, ISecurableChannel
type IpcServerChannel = class interface IChannelReceiver interface IChannel interface ISecurableChannel

summary.span: 針對遠端呼叫實作使用 IPC 系統傳輸訊息的伺服器通道。

span.span: Implements a server channel for remote calls that uses the IPC system to transmit messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-class-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-class-note.md)] .NET Framework 遠端基礎結構會使用通道來傳輸遠端呼叫。Channels are used by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls. 當用戶端呼叫遠端物件時，呼叫會序列化成訊息是由用戶端通道所傳送和接收的伺服器通道。When a client calls a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel. 在收到訊息之後，它會還原序列化，並處理。After the message is received, it is deserialized and processed. 任何傳回的值是經由伺服器通道，且由用戶端通道接收。Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel. 類別會使用同一部電腦上的應用程式定義域之間的傳輸訊息的 Windows 處理序間通訊 (IPC) 系統。The class uses the Windows interprocess communication (IPC) system to transport messages between application domains on the same computer. 在相同電腦上的應用程式定義域之間通訊時，IPC 通道時，速度比 TCP 或 HTTP 通道。When communicating between application domains on the same computer, the IPC channel is much faster than the TCP or HTTP channels. 若要在伺服器端執行額外處理的訊息，指定的實作介面，其中所處理的所有訊息透過傳遞執行個體。To perform additional processing of messages on the server side, specify an implementation of the interface through which all messages processed by the instance are passed. 執行個體會接受二進位或 SOAP 格式序列化的訊息。The instance accepts messages serialized in either binary or SOAP format. A物件中具有相關聯的組態屬性可以在設定執行階段組態檔中 (藉由叫用靜態方法) 或以程式設計方式 (藉由傳遞集合建構函式）。A object has associated configuration properties that can be set at run time either in a configuration file (by invoking the static method) or programmatically (by passing an collection to the constructor). 如需這些組態屬性的清單，請參閱文件建構函式。For a list of these configuration properties, see the documentation for the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 設定時`exclusiveAddressUse`屬性，以`false`中`properties`引數，數個物件都可以註冊的相同具名管道。When setting the `exclusiveAddressUse` property to `false` in the `properties` argument, several objects can be registered for the same named pipe. 在此情況下要求可以移至任何已註冊的通道。In such a case requests can go to any of the channels registered. 這項設定會被視為安全，只有當同時使用 Alc。This setting is considered secure only if ALCs are also used. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用類別。The following code example illustrates how to use the class. [!code-cpp[Remoting_Ipc#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Ipc/CPP/server.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_Ipc#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Ipc/CS/server.cs#10)] 上述程式碼用來公開 （expose） 下列遠端物件。The preceding code is used to expose the following remote object. [!code-cpp[Remoting_Ipc#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Ipc/CPP/counter.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_Ipc#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Ipc/CS/counter.cs#0)] 如需從遠端使用此物件的用戶端的範例，請參閱。For an example of a client using this object remotely, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需通道組態屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[通道和格式子組態屬性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100))。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100)). 如果您不需要接收功能，設定`sinkProvider`參數來`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`. > [!CAUTION] > 設定時`exclusiveAddressUse`屬性，以`false`中`properties`引數，數個物件都可以註冊的相同具名管道。When setting the `exclusiveAddressUse` property to `false` in the `properties` argument, several objects can be registered for the same named pipe. 在此情況下要求可以移至任何已註冊的通道。In such a case requests can go to any of the channels registered. 這項設定會被視為安全，只有當同時使用 Alc。This setting is considered secure only if ALCs are also used. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel#41](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel/CPP/server2.cpp#41)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel#41](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel/CS/server2.cs#41)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式設定屬性使用`name`參數。This constructor sets the property by using the `name` parameter. 如果您想要註冊多個通道，每個通道都必須具有唯一的名稱。If you want to register more than one channel, each channel must have a unique name. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需通道組態屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[通道和格式子組態屬性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100))。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100)). 如果您不需要接收功能，設定`sinkProvider`參數來`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`. 如果您不需要的安全性描述元，設定`securityDescriptor`參數來`null`。If you do not require a security descriptor, set the `securityDescriptor` parameter to `null`. > [!CAUTION] > 設定時`exclusiveAddressUse`屬性，以`false`中`properties`引數，數個物件都可以註冊的相同具名管道。When setting the `exclusiveAddressUse` property to `false` in the `properties` argument, several objects can be registered for the same named pipe. 在此情況下要求可以移至任何已註冊的通道。In such a case requests can go to any of the channels registered. 這項設定會被視為安全，只有當同時使用 Alc。This setting is considered secure only if ALCs are also used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式設定屬性使用`name`參數。This constructor sets the property by using the `name` parameter. 如果您想要註冊多個通道，每個通道都必須具有唯一的名稱。If you want to register more than one channel, each channel must have a unique name. 如果您不需要接收功能，設定`sinkProvider`參數來`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然傳回的執行個體形式類別，這個屬性的值可以轉換成的執行個體描述的通道物件接聽。Although returned as an instance of the class, the value of this property can be cast to an instance of that describes the channel to which the object listens. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel/CPP/server.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel/CS/server.cs#15)]

span.span: Gets the name of the current channel.

value.span: 執行個體，包含通道的名稱。

span.span: A instance that contains the name of the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個已註冊的通道都有唯一的名稱。Every registered channel has a unique name. 名稱用來呼叫時，擷取特定通道方法。The name is used to retrieve a specific channel when calling the method. 預設名稱是"ipc server"。The default name is "ipc server". ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel/CPP/server.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel/CS/server.cs#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChannelPriority As Integer
public: property int ChannelPriority { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前通道的優先權。

span.span: Gets the priority of the current channel.

value.span: 整數，表示指派給通道的優先權。

span.span: An integer that indicates the priority assigned to the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 優先順序會控制哪一個通道資料會出現在次序執行個體; 較低優先順序通道之前出現的較高優先順序通道。The priority controls the order in which channel data appears in a instance; higher priority channels appear before lower priority channels. 用戶端嘗試連線到它們列在順序中的伺服器通道執行個體。Clients try to connect to the server channels in the order that they are listed in the instance. 預設的優先順序是 20;允許使用負數的優先順序。The default priority is 20; negative priorities are allowed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel#13](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel/CPP/server.cpp#13)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel/CS/server.cs#13)]

summary.span: 指示目前通道開始接聽要求。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to start listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不需要呼叫這個方法，以開始接聽新初始化通道。It is not necessary to call this method to begin listening on a newly initialized channel. 使用這個方法來重新啟動之後在通道上接聽已經停止接聽通道上呼叫方法。Use this method to restart listening on a channel after the method has been called to stop listening on the channel. 資料物件可用來將特定的初始化狀態傳遞至通道。The data object can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel. 如果您不想將特定狀態傳遞至通道，則會傳遞`null`做為`data`參數值。If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, pass `null` as the `data` parameter value.

exception.span: 指定的接聽連接埠無法使用。

span.span: The specified listening port is not available.

param.name: data
param.span: 指定初始狀態的物件，但如果不想將特定狀態傳遞至通道，則為 。

span.span: An object that specifies an initialization state, or , if you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel.

summary.span: 指示目前通道停止接聽要求。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to stop listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要停止接聽通道上使用這個方法。Use this method to stop listening on a channel. 若要重新啟動接聽，請使用方法。To restart listening, use the method. 資料物件可用來將特定的初始化狀態傳遞至通道。The data object can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel. 如果您不想將特定狀態傳遞至通道，則會傳遞`null`做為`data`參數值。If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, pass `null` as the `data` parameter value.
